articles.title: Tony Dungy refuses to share if he voted for Belichick, Kraft on Hall-of-Fame ballot
articles.description:
“I said I’m not going to make a comment on it until we find out who’s in and who’s out."

The post Tony Dungy refuses to share if he voted for Belichick, Kraft on Hall-of-Fame ballot appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Tony Dungy declined to disclose his Hall-of-Fame ballot choices for Belichick and Kraft.
Dungy stated he will wait until the final results are announced.
Boston fans await potential Hall-of-Fame recognition for local sports icons Belichick and Kraft.

articles.title: ‘You changed my life’: Cory Durden’s Cinderella season continues with Patriots
articles.description:
“He gave me an opportunity. I feel like an opportunity of a lifetime."

The post ‘You changed my life’: Cory Durden’s Cinderella season continues with Patriots appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Cory Durden credits Patriots coach Mike Vrabel for changing his life this season.
Durden's performance has significantly boosted the Patriots' chances in Super Bowl LX.
Local fans are rallying behind Durden, enhancing community support for the team.

articles.title: Payton Pritchard thrives in return to bench as Celtics roll over Mavericks: 6 takeaways
articles.description:
Pritchard's return to the bench could be related to the impending departure of Anfernee Simons, and the return of another player?

The post Payton Pritchard thrives in return to bench as Celtics roll over Mavericks: 6 takeaways appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Payton Pritchard excelled off the bench as Celtics defeated Mavericks 112-102.
Pritchard's performance may influence Anfernee Simons' potential trade from the team.
Celtics' bench depth strengthens, benefiting Boston fans as playoffs approach.
